meanings.sent1: I accidentally overfilled the cup with water, causing it to spill over.
meanings.sent2: The chef warned us not to overfill the pot with pasta to avoid a mess.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was overfilling with air, looking like it might burst at any moment.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was overfilling with joy as she watched her children play happily.
meanings.sent5: The excitement overfilling the room was palpable as the audience awaited the performance.

meanings.definition: The act of filling something beyond its capacity.
meanings.sent1: The overfilling of the bathtub caused water to spill onto the floor.
meanings.sent2: The overfilling of the jar with candies made it difficult to close the lid.
meanings.sent3: The overfilling of the suitcase with clothes made it impossible to zip shut.
meanings.sent4: The overfilling of the stadium with fans created a lively and energetic atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The overfilling of the classroom with students made it feel cramped and crowded.
